content: *add a little star shine to any project great for spreading christmas cheer and using up teeny tiny scraps * **pattern notes** this pattern is for a small crocheted star worked in the round **skill level** *easy* basic stitches used only **yarn** any **needles/hook** recommended hook for yarn **materials** yarn needle **size** dependant on yarn used **gauge** n/a **pattern includes ** * a full written pattern with clear instructions * **crochet chart** **pattern written in ** uk terms us translations given **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 1 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
